head.supplied: Office of Lands & Survey, ¶ Melbourne, 7th. May, 1862. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to furnish the following lists of plants required for the Reserves in the vicinity of Melbourne during the current ...

div.p: 62/, unit 10, pp. 475-7, VPRS 7935/P1, outward letterbooks to the general public, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: I have the honor to furnish the following lists of plants required for the Reserves in the vicinity of Melbourne during the current year, and request that you will have the goodness to retain the necessary supplies of the several plants mentioned, until a cart is sent to convey them away on the days specified.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Assist. Commr. of Lands and Survey.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Plants required for the Fitzroy Gardens to be sent for on Friday May 9th at 8.30 am

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
A few specimens of valuable species of Pinus and some arborescent cupressi from California as promised in your note to me dated 26th April.
Letter not found.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Plants required for Reserve around Crown Lands Office to be sent for on May 16th at 8.30 am.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Plants to be sent for on Tuesday May 23rd.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 2.0626in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: 14 Large Elms (as agreed upon with Dr Mueller)

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 2.0626in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 2.0626in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Plants to be sent for on Monday June 23rd.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;

font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 2.0626in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: The supply of trees and shrubs for the South Park and Flagstaff Hill Reserve cannot be sooner sent for as the requisite fencing in the latter is not yet commenced and in the former is not confirmed yet.
